title: 1505-D
statement: D. Xenolith? Hippodrome?time limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputInputThe input contains two integers $$$N$$$, $$$M$$$ ($$$1 \\le N \\le 1024, 2 \\le M \\le 16$$$), separated by a single space.OutputOutput "YES" or "NO".ExamplesInput2 3OutputYESInput3 2OutputNOInput33 16OutputYESInput26 5OutputNO
